Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to be followed by Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION across variants that include both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time spent in Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION for cases that later require approval by BUDGET OWNER compared to those that do not
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment in successful payment variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Payment Handled in cases where no BUDGET OWNER approval is required
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in variants that originate from resubmissions after rejection by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Minimum time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION in high-frequency variants (e.g., top 3 most frequent)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average waiting time to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in domestic declaration cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that skip BUDGET OWNER approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION when followed directly by supervisor approval versus when followed by budget owner approval
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Payment Handled in the fastest 10% of completed cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time it takes Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to lead to a rejection by ADMINISTRATION in rejected variants
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time elapsed between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the next activity, grouped by year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'", 'end': '', 'aggregation': 'average', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
